Helping Hands Helping others brings out the richness of mankind in its highest level. Let\'s get together to enlighten another life at least as simply as we can. This app is slight step towards it in which we expect to make establishments for patients with who are willing to help them. In addition, those are willing to make blood donations can also register and contact the necessary parties. Next User Name Login with your credentials Password Login Sign up Name Email Phone number Create Account Edit Details Delete Account Update My Profile My Profile NoOfProfiles We are pleased to state that the person who has following details has made a contribution to save life by donating blood to the following blood bank. name ID Number Blood Bank id number blood bank Helping Hands Organization Hey there! Let us know some of your details to issue your certificte. May we know your regestered code first RegCode
ok fine! We could verify your frankness. Then can you please input your full name? Finally we want to know your ID number Thank you very much for your information. Now you can view your certificate. View Certificate Establishments Patients Blood Donation "Users " Chat(only for blood donators) FirstProject Number of donaters we have right now Blood group "number of donas we have " Contact us on 0 112 369 931 National blood transfursion services , Narahenpita,Elvitigala mavath, Colombo these labs and hospitals are connected with us. You can donate your blood on this locations. You can donate your blood on this locations.
